mapper.sql: t0.*,t1.fid feid ,t1.fbillid ,t1.fentriyid ,t1.fmaid ,t1.fstockid ,t1.fqty ,isnull(t1.fstate,0)fstate ,t1.fbrand ,t1.fqulity ,t1.fdeldate ,t1.fcontnum ,isnull(t1.freceiptqty,0)freceiptqty ,isnull(t1.frefoundqty,0)frefoundqty ,isnull(t1.fstoredqty,0)fstoredqty ,t1.fjudgetype ,t1.fnote,t3.fid suid,t3.supplierNumber sunumber,t3.supplierName suname, t4.fid orid,t4.organizationName ornumber,t4.organizationName orname, t5.fid stid,t5.stockNumber stnumber,t5.stockName stname, t6.fid cuid,t6.customName cuname,t6.customNumber cunumber,t7.fid crid,t7.userName crname, t8.fid auid,t8.userName auname,t9.fid fmaid,t9.materialNumber,t9.materialName,t9.materialModel, t9.materialUnit,t10.fid fstid,t10.stockNumber,t10.stockName,t10.stockAddress,t10.stockTel
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from T_VS_BillOrder t0 left join T_VS_BillOrderEntry t1 on t0.fbillid=t1.fbillid left join T_VS_Supplier t3 on t0.fsupplierid=t3.fid left join T_VS_Organization t4 on t0.fdepartmentid=t4.fid left join T_VS_Stock t5 on t0.frestockid=t5.fid left join T_VS_Custom t6 on t0.fcustomid=t6.fid left join T_VS_User t7 on t0.fcruserid=t7.fid left join T_VS_User t8 on t0.fchuserid=t8.fid left join T_VS_Material t9 on t1.fmaid=t9.fid left join T_VS_Stock t10 on t1.fstockid=t10.fid
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from T_VS_BillOrder t0 left join T_VS_BillOrderEntry t1 on t0.fbillid=t1.fbillid left join T_VS_Supplier t3 on t0.fsupplierid=t3.fid left join T_VS_Organization t4 on t0.fdepartmentid=t4.fid left join T_VS_Stock t5 on t0.frestockid=t5.fid left join T_VS_Custom t6 on t0.fcustomid=t6.fid left join T_VS_User t7 on t0.fcruserid=t7.fid left join T_VS_User t8 on t0.fchuserid=t8.fid left join T_VS_Material t9 on t1.fmaid=t9.fid left join T_VS_Stock t10 on t1.fstockid=t10.fid where t0.fbillid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete:
delete from t_vs_billorder where fbillid = #{fbillid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
delete from t_vs_billorderentry where fbillid=#{fbillid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into T_VS_BillOrder ( fnumber, fsupplierid, fcustomid, frestockid, fcreatetime, fcruserid, fcheckdate, fchuserid, fdepartmentid, fstatus, fnote,fbizdate,fbuyer ) values ( #{fnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fsupplierid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fcustomid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{frestockid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fcruserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fcheckdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fchuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fdepartmentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fnote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fbizdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{fbuyer,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

fnumber,
fsupplierid,

frestockid,
fcreatetime,
fcruserid,
fcheckdate,

mapper.update:
update T_VS_BillOrder
fbillid = #{fbillid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fnumber = #{fnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fsupplierid = #{fsupplierid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fcustomid = #{fcustomid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
frestockid = #{frestockid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fcreatetime = #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
fcruserid = #{fcruserid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fcheckdate = #{fcheckdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
fchuserid = #{fchuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fdepartmentid = #{fdepartmentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fstatus = #{fstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fnote = #{fnote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fbizdate = #{fbizdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
fbuyer = #{fbuyer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update T_VS_BillOrder set fnumber = #{fnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fsupplierid = #{fsupplierid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fcustomid = #{fcustomid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, frestockid = #{frestockid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fcreatetime = #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fcruserid = #{fcruserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fcheckdate = #{fcheckdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fchuserid = #{fchuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fdepartmentid = #{fdepartmentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fstatus = #{fstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fnote = #{fnote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fbizdate = #{fbizdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fbuyer = #{fbuyer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_VS_BillOrder set fnumber = #{fnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fsupplierid = #{fsupplierid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fcustomid = #{fcustomid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, frestockid = #{frestockid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fcreatetime = #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fcruserid = #{fcruserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fcheckdate = #{fcheckdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fchuserid = #{fchuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fdepartmentid = #{fdepartmentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fstatus = #{fstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fnote = #{fnote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fbizdate = #{fbizdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fbuyer = #{fbuyer,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where fbillid = #{fbillid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: exec Proc_saveBillOrder #{采购凭证},#{凭证日期},#{供应商/供应工厂},#{creatorid},#{PGr},#{物料},#{短文本},#{OUn},#{数量},#{净价},#{币别}
